name: atom-psql
description: atom integration with postgresql psql client

maximumSqlViews.description: The maximum number of sql view tabs before we start removing old ones

maximumSqlViewInKb.description: The maximum sql view file size in Kb

readFromNamedPipe.description: If enabled, we read from Named Pipe file otherwise we use file watcher

psqlPromptRegexp.description: psql normal prompt regular expression (in order to find if pager is active)

psqlPagerStopSendCommand.description: psql character sequence for sending to psql in order to stop the pager
